author: Neil Strawson and Richard Hunt
programme: I Can Cook on the Go
method: Preheat the oven at 180C/350F/Gas 4. Grease four holes of a muffin tray. Cut the tortilla wrap into four, then press a quarter of the wrap into each muffin hole. Mix the mince, kidney beans, ratatouille and paprika together in a bowl. Divide the mixture between the muffin holes. Sprinkle over the cheese. Bake in the oven for 15 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, for greasing,  1 large flour tortilla,  2 tbsp cooked beef mince,  2 tbsp cooked kidney beans,  2 tbsp tinned ratatouille,  ½ tsp paprika,  15g/½ oz mature cheddar, grated
